column4: Hello, in Gkrellm, How do I know Wich temp is from the North Bridge and South Bridge? I can only see them as temp1, temp2, temp3
depends largely on the model of your notebook
It is a Desktop PC, What do i need to look for in order to find out? I have an Intel DG35EC
you would have to find out, where the sensors are situated - at least for notebooks there a listings to be found
